name: Hollow Ichigo New Post Icons
description: I noticed that a lot of characters get styles for new post icons and since I rp as Ichigo's inner hollow I wanted to make a style of him. If you wanna make a request send something here and I'll get back to you or get it up here. This is mainly practice for me for now so some mistakes will be made on occasion.

user.name: Liars Burn
user.about: I love art and writing but it was more recently that I began to teach myself HTML and CSS. I'm still learning and so that majority of what I make will be very raw until I get better.
